lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Article I in the agreement states that "purchases/sales of commodities under this Agreement will be made at the market price prevailing for these products at the time of purchase/sale and in accordance with normal commercial terms."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "How can I tell that we are ready to fulfill the agreement if the United States does not want to offer us grain at competitive prices?" said Albert Melnikov, deputy trade representative of the Soviet Union to the United States.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. offer of subsidized wheat to the Soviets was rejected because of an insufficient subsidy, Melnikov said.
